category: Herbs the Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat cools the Blood and removes toxicity

indications: Common cold, traumatic injury, rheumatic arthritis, chronic osteomyelitis, acute gastroenteritis, hemoptysis

action.primary: Nourishes Yin, moistens the Lungs and promotes salivation

indications: Cough due to Lung Heat, hemoptysis associated with tuberculosis
